data.name: The Colorful Creature Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
About the soundtrack


This soundtrack is made for the game by the name of The Colorful Creature. By semi-popular request, people wanted an official soundtrack for the game and we are here to deliver. Enjoy the 30+ songs that are included in this playlist!

This official soundtrack contains a playlist that has most of the songs in a uncompressed .wav format. This playlist will keep updating when the base game also receives brand new songs!
